article: Mr. Black was working in a factory in a big town. He liked  _  very much, and was very good  _  it. When he was free, he  _  down to a small river behind the factory and tried  to find  some fish, but there were very few there,  _  the water wasn't clean. One summer he went to the seaside during his holiday and stayed at a small cheap hotel. "I have never fished in the  _  before." He thought. "It will be more interesting than fishing in our river."  _  first he caught a lot of fish and was very  _  . He gave them to the hotel and they cooked them for guests, and he enjoyed himself very much. After  _  , he did this every day. But  _  he got his bill at the end of the week, he saw it, "For oil to cook fish(7 days), 70 dollars ."
